== Main Inclusion Report for Student Control Panel ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/student-control-panel/
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed to assist in the maintenance of edubuntu LTSP servers
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** Does not open any port.
** Uses system dbus, but controlled by ACL to prevent non-root writing.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
